item.title: I need help putin some objects.. like .. a target for training range
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

search for

case 4:it will look something like this …

case 4: ReplaceObject2((objectX - 1), objectY, objectID, Face, 0); server.objectHandler.ObjectType[ArrayID] = 3; break; } }somewhere below that add(if you don’t already have it)

public void AddGlobalObj(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face, int ObjectType) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { if(person.distanceToPoint(objectX, objectY) <= 60) { person.ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, NewObjectID, Face, ObjectType); } } } } }and directly under that add

public void NewObjects() {}then search for

case 121:it will look something like this

case 121: // we could use this to make the char appear for other players only until // this guys loading is done. Also wait with regular player updates // until we receive this command. // println_debug("Loading finished."); break;right above

break;add

NewObjects();

now go to public void newobjects and in the {} use this format

AddGlobalObj(objectX, objectY, ItemID, Face, ObjectType);

objectx is the x coord
objecty is the y coord
itemid is the id of the item
face is the direction the object will be facing
and object type is the type of object it is

some stuff you might want to know
FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
ObjectType: 0-3 wall objects, 4-8 wall decoration, 9: diag. walls, 10-11 world objects, 12-21: roofs, 22: floor decoration

adding NewObjects in case 121 reduces lagg significantly

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[code]i added

public void NewObjects() { // i loot i ( non laggy !) makeGlobalObject(3284, 3883, 2156, -2, 10);//007

remove code cause idk dont know wat happned u gotta add these if u dont have them:

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType); } } } } }

then

public void NewObjects() { // i loot i ( non laggy !)

all these wen u goto client.java and scroll a lil down a bit

and serach:

public boolean process() {

and put under the {

NewObjects();

report erroers[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2007, 05:36:19 PM[/size][hr]and if ya wanna put portals/ teleing things on pimp serach

case 773

under the break;

add

case 7289: teleportToX = 3252; teleportToY = 3435; sendMessage("Welcome To Preparation Center...You Train Here..."); setAnimation(0x320); break;

case the portal/teleing thingy object code

X And Y Were u wanna be teled

item.title: I need help putin some objects.. like .. a target for training range
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[code]…nope goto ur client.java and serach
public void NewObjects() { // code 4 u

thenn make a object

public void NewObjects() { // i loot i ( non laggy !) makeGlobalObject(3284, 3883, 2156, -2, 10);//007

3284 and 3883 are xand y coords of were u want it to be summoned and 2156 is the code of the object and -2 is whcih way it is facing…and 10 idk…just leave it alone and u wanted a target for range? wats the code for it and ill tell how u how and stuff

and if u want target range put the code as 2513
and serach ur java for case 2513
and under it add:

case 2513: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Train Range Dude!!"); actionName = "You Just Shoot Me...Said The Target!"; actionTimer = 10; setAnimation(426); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[18]), 18); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

if u want them to go slow change actiontimer enjoy :P[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2007, 03:26:01 PM[/size][hr]srry 4 the incovience the mopar codes are messing up idk…-.-
